Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO PROCUREMENT AND CONTRACTS

Title: Exempts certain business enterprise subcontractors who seek to do work with not-for-profit corporations from certain requirements
Summary: Authorizes certain business enterprise subcontractors who seek to do work with not-for-profit corporations to receive MWBE certification if certain criteria is met; imposes a $50,001 limit on the provision of such services or work; makes related provisions.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to exempting certain business enterprise subcontractors who seek to do work with not-for-profit corporations from certain requirements
